issue.title: [CI][Docs] Doxygen not ran in the docs nightly build
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15394](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15394). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Discovered on the nightly dev docs that the C++ API pages are not working, because doxygen is not used in the nightly doc build

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15394?focusedCommentId=17479676) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 12211
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12211>
